titleStmt.title: A discourse of the use of reason in matters of religion shewing that Christianity contains nothing repugnant to right reason, against enthusiasts and deists / written in Latin by the Reverend Dr. Rust ; and translated into English, with annotations upon it by Hen. Hallywell.
titleStmt.author: Rust, George, d. 1670.
Hallywell, Henry, d. 1703?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Hen. Hills, Jun. for Water Kettilby,

notesStmt.note: Latin text followed by English translation.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
